- Probability of B present: 3/4
Combined: (1/4)*(3/4)=3/16. Phenotype C: 3/16.

Class D: Neither C nor B present. - Probability: (1/4)*(1/4)=1/16. Phenotype D: 1/16.

Now, converting these fractions to ratios:

Phenotype A: 9 parts
Phenotype B: 3 parts
Phenotype C: 3 parts
Phenotype D: 1 part

Total: 9+3+3+1=16 parts.

- 3/16: plain and brown
